entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Data.Odbc OdbcFactory.Instance is null #82920
  • System.Net.Http.Json.Functional.Tests failed in CI on mono_interpreter linux x64 Debug leg #82918
  • [API Proposal]: make payload types in System.Net.Http.DiagnosticsHandler to be public #82910
  • [browser][icu] Automate custom icu creation #82908
    8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Remove method body for inlined methods #82907
    8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Avoid generating rgctx fetch trampolines in generic sharing #82906
    Future
  • [wasi][icu] bundle icu files into .wasm #82895
  • Several XML tests are sporadically failing in CI due to OOMs #82894
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Code analyse rule that require passing of cancellation token #82889
  • [browser] don't publish native DLLs #82888
    8.0.0
  • AssemblyExtensions.TryGetRawMetadata not implemented on monovm #82887
  • Test failure System.Net.Quic.Tests.MsQuicPlatformDetectionTests.SupportedWindowsPlatforms_IsSupportedIsTrue #82885
  • [browser] FetchError: request failed, reason: Parse Error: Invalid header value char #82880
    8.0.0
  • .NET 7 breaking change in HttpClient timeout handling #82878
  • Dotnet7-Alpine3.17 has an error during the pre-login handshake #82892
  • Error in fresh Ubuntu 22.04.2 install: setlocale: LC_ALL: cannot change locale (en_US.UTF-8) crossgen-corelib.proj #82873
  • [API Proposal]: Add an overload of the StackTrace constructor to take in an array of frames #82871
  • Not able to serialize Geometry with System.Text.Json #82870

Closed

  • GC overestimates available memory #82815
    8.0.0
  • [wasi] Respect `WASMTIME_PATH` #82391
    8.0.0
  • Size regression in Minimal API NativeAOT app #82732
  • [API Proposal]: Make it easier to create quality ValidateOptionsResult instances #77404
    8.0.0
  • Upgrading Visual Studio from 17.3 to 17.5 causes Blazor errors in the console #82778
  • [API Proposal]: Add Random.GetItem(IReadOnlyList<T> choices) #80651
    8.0.0
  • Parallel.ForEachAsync edge case deadlock #82427
  • Howto implement HashSet.GetOrAdd(T) extension method in .NET 6 or .NET 7 using CollectionsMarshal #82875
  • Different behaviour of default interface impelmentation in monoVM vs CoreCLR #81882
    8.0.0
  • Failures in SSL Stream tests: There are no more endpoints available in the endpoint mapper. #74838
    8.0.0
  • Address NativeAOT header file strategy to allow windows global definitions to co-exist #81285
    8.0.0
  • dotnet 7 System.Text.Json JsonSerializer.Serialize exception: is marked required but does not specify a setter. #82879
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json: Ignore only (de)serialization #82904
  • Currency and Number formatting separators for en-BE CultureInfo is incorrect for Core #82898
  • Icon/Image from Stream doesn't work for partial reads #80261
    8.0.0
  • SoundPlayer from Stream doesn't work for partial reads #80264
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose method on PeriodicTimer to adjust interval #60384
    8.0.0
  • [wasi] `Invariant.Tests` failing with `Failed to load ./icudt.dat` #82567
    8.0.0
  • .NET 7 WebAssembly - Algorithm 'Aes' is not supported on this platform. #82472
    Future
  • Some `System.Buffers.Binary.Tests.ReverseEndiannessUnitTests` tests broken on `main` #82868
  • [wasm] System.Memory.Tests broken if SIMD is enabled #82808
  • [API Proposal]: MemoryExtensions.AsSpan(this string? text, Range range) #77955
    8.0.0
  • bool does not implement IParsable<TSelf> #78523
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: String should implement IParsable<string> #78842
  • Crossgen hangs and crashes on MacOs #81570
  • NET7 macOS: Impossible to symbolize managed addresses in AppCenter #80550
    Future
  • Cross architecture CLRDEBUGINFO<host_os><host_arch> resource missing on windows coreclr #78282
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Port #82470 (disable EventPipe stack collection with environment variable) to 7.0 #82921
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [jiterp] Perform a single unsigned bounds check for array accesses #82919
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Adding System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe.BitCast #82917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix a few async void tests to be async Task #82914
  • Add IPAddress ISpanFormattable/Parsable implementations #82913
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Allow default AsyncFlowControls rather than throwing #82912
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • [wasi] More cross compiler fixes. #82911
  • Bump xharness to fix TCP issue in maccatalyst #82903
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-maccatalyst
  • [release/7.0] Fix pthread_cond_wait race on macOS #82893
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [browser] Calculate hash for runtime assets #82891
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Implement managed SegmentCommandLine #82883
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Guard more COM interop related code #82882
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Revert "Enable symbol stripping for crossgen2" #82881
    area-Setup, community-contribution
  • Improve DateTime.ParseExact perf for invariant culture #82877
    area-System.Globalization, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Improve controlling which scenarios test libraries should be run against #82876
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Only call base.DisposeAsync on classes derived from FileStream #82874
    area-System.IO

Merged

  • Disable SupportedWindowsPlatforms_IsSupportedIsTrue on Windows Arm64 #82902
    area-System.Net
  • [mono][aot] Emit cctor instantiations for classes referenced by gshar… #82900
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [mono][aot] Emit a list of exported methods into the AOT image and load them when the image is loaded. #82809
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • EventPipe env var to disable stack collection #82470
    EventPipe, 8.0.0
  • Mark some internal/private structs as readonly #82415
    area-Meta
  • [wasi] CI: Provision `wasi-sdk`, and `wasmtime` only when needed #82454
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi
  • [wasm] Fix tests substitution conditions #82901
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add dedicated empty array enumerator for footprint reduction #82899
    area-System.Runtime
  • Introducing ValidateOptionsResultBuilder #82749
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Mark Microsoft.NET.ILLink as non-shipping #82905
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [iOS][maccatalyst] Disable MacCatalyst and Simulator CI runs #82915
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix string allocation in DateTimeParse.ParseByFormat #82861
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • Store Parallel.ForEachAsync exceptions from cancellation callbacks #82434
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • Stop storing the parsed RID fallback graph #82811
    area-Host
  • disable tests on Server 2022 with spanish locale #82578
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Append version to RID only with valid characters #81497
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix SoundPlayer handling of partial reads on streams #82612
    area-Microsoft.Win32
  • Fix Icon(Stream) handling of partial reads #82621
    area-System.Drawing
  • [workloads] Upstream workload fixes from 7.0 #82069
    area-Workloads
  • EventPipe lock implementation #82790
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Avoid unnecessary relinking when publishing a blazor project for AOT #82748
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add PeriodicTimer.Period property #82560
    area-System.Threading
  • Move throw out of inlined CompositeFormat helper #82543
    area-System.Runtime
  • Combine ExecutionContext/CapturedContext fields in ManualResetValueTaskSourceCore #82181
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Glossary: Change SoS link to documentation and describe origin in description. (Was: Change source for SoS to Wayback Machine link) #81178
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • disable SendFileGetsCanceledByDispose also on Catalyst #82782
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Use shared IValueTaskSource implementation in AwaitableSocketAsyncEventArgs #82147
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Pass wasi invariant mode through env variable #82707
    arch-wasm
  • ActiveIssue for BuildInvalidSignatureTwice on mono interpreter. #82864
    area-System.Security
  • [mono][interp] Fix incorrect masking #82890
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [browser][docs] Update keywords. #82896
    documentation, arch-wasm
  • Add MemoryExtensions.AsSpan(string, Index/Range) #82794
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Simplify IndexOfAnyAsciiByteValues for needles with 0 on X86 #82866
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • Have bool and string implement ISpanParsable<T> #82836
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Fix intrinsics substitution condition #82886
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Support new feature on browser: instrumentation pause #82852
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono] Move networking code to debugger component #82785
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [browser] remove unused methods #82865
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Enable symbol stripping for crossgen2 #82698
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add OS/architecture specific CLRDEBUGINFO resource #82863
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Unify Array enumerators between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #82751
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fixed name of frozen string dictionary files #82482
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2125925 #82869
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Try skipping generation of empty method dictionaries #82591
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2122151 #81871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Replace `SafeLocalAllocHandle` in `System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter` #82456
    area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter, community-contribution
  • [JIT] Fixed improper peephole zero-extension removal when cdq/cwde instructions are involved #82733
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] X86/X64 - Eliminate redundant 'cmp' instructions #82750
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Try to untangle the rid calculation. #82832
    community-contribution
  • Use SOS to dump managed stack traces from a dump on Windows #82867
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Remove JTRUE(relop) invariant in the backend #82766
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • CoreCLR support for InlineArrayAttribute. (struct layout part) #82744
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [Mono] Enable runtime tests running on arm64 with mini JIT #82814
  • Implement correct handling of new constraint in ilc #82818
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Share all "Compiles" tests from VTableIndexStubGenerator with ComInterfaceGenerator #82657
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Avx512 extract most significant bits #82731
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [draft][wasm] Smoke tests for node on runtime pipeline #78769
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Expand runtime lookups in a late phase #81635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Do not use ALC name for AssemblyName in DispatchProxy #82807
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.x
  • [IGNORE][wasi] Open PR to run *all* the tests #81649
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi
  • Add exceptions to TAR extended attribute constructors to disallow '=' and '\n' characters in keys and values. #82812
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Implement native container types used by shared EventPipe code. #78852
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension intrinsinsic + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • update mariner Linux image to 2.0 #81973
    os-linux, area-System.Net.Quic, os-mariner
  • Remove the defunct DiagnosticUtility/Fx classes from DataContractSerialization #82324
    area-Serialization
  • Create source generator for configuration binding #82179
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Nullable annotation fixes #82803
    area-Meta
  • [tests] Retain OutDir for ioslike tests #82313
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Add tests for build with SIMD disabled #82845
    area-Build-mono
  • [Mono] Add initial arm64 hardware intrinsics support for mini JIT #82420
  • Initial changes for GetLocaleInfoString #81470
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • SequenceReader performance; elide bounds checks and book-keeping #82765
    area-System.Memory
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Initial emscripten 3.1.30 support #81215
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Add NT_SIGINFO NOTE to ELF dumps #82449
  • [wasm] Improve jiterpreter trace entry point selection heuristic #82604
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [release/7.0] Microsoft.NETCore.Platforms: fix graph not being updated on pack. #82851
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use SecurityTransforms for RSA+PSS #82728
    area-System.Security, os-ios, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • [NativeAOT] Add System.Globalization.Native builds for iOS-like platforms #82393
    os-ios, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Enable direct call transformation for MONO_PATCH_INFO_METHOD #82711
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Use output size helpers for cryptographic primitives #82800
    area-System.Security
  • [browser] Fix encoding problem when publishing #82833
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Switch JsonReaderHelper.IndexOfQuoteOrAnyControlOrBackSlash to use IndexOfAnyValues #82789
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Add basic SIMD support to the jiterpreter #82773
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Remove S.S.Permissions reference from S.C.ConfigurationManager #82259
    area-System.Configuration, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant and to use saturation for overflow #82781
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0][wasm][debugger] Support new feature on browser: instrumentation pause #82855
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0][wasm][debugger] Support new feature on browser: instrumentation pause #82854
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • [browser] legacy JS interop optional via WasmEnableLegacyJsInterop - native #82834
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Use RegDeleteTree in RegistryKey.DeleteSubKeyTree #82598
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Add type-forwarders for Xamarin.Android compatibility to System.Drawing.Common.dll #82839
    area-System.Drawing
  • add RID for Ubuntu 23.04 #82284
    area-Meta
  • Allow Base64Decoder to ignore space chars, add IsValid methods and tests #79334
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [browser] legacy JS interop optional via WasmEnableLegacyJsInterop - managed #82826
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Issue correct Enable/Disable commands for EventSources with EventPipe #81867
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [browser] wasm memory snapshot into browser cache #82049
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Prevent use of null when processing ALPN list #81797
    area-System.Net.Security, blocked, os-linux, 7.0.x
  • Enable DwarfDump AOT test in Release #82862
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Support WindowStyle without UseShellExecute #82662
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fold unreachable cases for switch in importer. #82793
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Enable mono runtime to handle SIGTERM like CoreCLR #82806 #82813
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-02
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Support for ARM32 in NativeAOT #833
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM, WASM] Problem when used as WASM plugin / being run with wasmer #2205

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Pass structs by reference in accordance with the WASM C ABI #2220
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge oct 22 #2219

Updated

  • Save EMCC linker parameters to RSP file #2209
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consistency for `os` and `arch` CLI argument names #30962
  • Unable to install any dotnet tool #30961
  • After Install 7.0.202 on Mac OS, install wasm-tools workload via Terminal met an error "Workload installation failed". #30959

Closed

  • Enable using docker build `--platform` switch (easily) #30369
    8.0.1xx
  • Add --configfile switch to dotnet list package #24004
    Backlog
  • Community feedback survey #23708
    Discussion
  • [Regression] Runtime error introduced when build using SDK 5.0.301 #18229
  • [GenAPI] Add unsafe keyword if the calls of the base constructor is unsafe  #30640
    8.0.1xx
  • dotnet restore fails for .NET 8 preview 1 SDK due to missing NuGet package dependency #30897
  • dotnet tool install --local takes .config/nuget.config instead of nuget.config in current working directory #23135
    8.0.1xx
  • dotnet publish should default to release mode #10357
    8.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unused razor dependency #30964
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Restore Encoding for the .NET SDK upon Exit #30963

Merged

  • GenAPI: Add unsafe keyword if the calls of the base constructor is unsafe #30950
    Area-GenAPI

Updated

  • Introduce `Workload Clean`: Garbage Collection Component #30266
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add new line to C# item templates with file-scoped namespaces #30955
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-Common templates
  • Add tracking of the nuget cache to see how many files we downloaded during the test run. #29264
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix passing --interactive flag to nuget #30806
  • [GenAPI] add new keyword to return types #30932
    Area-GenAPI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30952
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2125975 #30714
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-02
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Proposal]: [Indented Verbatim String] #4013

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Extensions #5497
    Working Set
  • Proposal: Fast, Efficient Unions #7016
  • Proposal: Semi-Auto-Properties; `field` keyword #140
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Collection literals #5354
    Working Set

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider warning for [StructLayout] usage with primary constructor #67162
  • Incremental generator not being run incrementally for selected primitive value #67160
  • Can not find any resources how to add a project to a solution using a .NET core application #67158
  • Nullable assert firing while building our Visual Studio code #67153
    17.6

Closed

  • Always show IntelliCode items at the top of completion list #46453
    Backlog
  • Using the discard operator can not be compiled #67121
  • AnalyzerDriver should not capture cancellation token #67084
  • Intellisense shows members for all types from all overloads with lambda parameter #43966
    Backlog
  • Overload completion misses generic constraint #47049
    Backlog
  • Typing should be allowed before the inline parameter hint #47016
    Backlog
  • Bring Back Function View like the old VB6 used to have, that is a valuable feature. #47005
    Backlog
  • TimeoutException: Shutting down debugging session for extension development (Connect to RoslynLanguageService) #46970
    Backlog
  • Refactor: Resolve namespaces #46833
    Backlog
  • C# 9 Analyzer: Flag suspect pattern usages #46637
    Backlog
  • IntelliSense: Delegate Auto Complete #46278
    Backlog
  • Code editor goes wild when entering a regex #46507
    Backlog
  • autoformatting curley braces causes repeated crashes #45445
    Backlog
  • Didn't throw warning for the suppression operator #45420
    Backlog
  • Codelens reference links are added to selected field last #45395
    Backlog
  • Add Page Number References that actively updates in '//' comments #45358
    Backlog
  • Positional record constructor invocation highlights the entire declaration #45275
    Backlog
  • cntrl+Q search fails to find symbols in folder view #45084
    Backlog
  • Avoid accessing Workspace.CurrentSolution in CodeAction.PostProcessChangesAsync #42779
    Backlog
  • Autocompletion for Search and Replace #44842
    Backlog
  • Unable to rename a variable containing an underscore. #44825
    Backlog
  • Move method parameter left or right with a key combination #44625
    Backlog
  • GenerateProperty/Field: consider adjusting behavior for positional records #44557
    Backlog
  • Figure out QuickInfo for positional records #44556
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.CodeGeneration.CSharpCodeGenerationService.AddMethod should be adjusted to deal with "Top-level statements" #44425
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Multitarget O# external access projects to fix issues accessing prope… #67163
    Area-Infrastructure
  • How to troubleshoot a build-time regression #67161
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Execute symbol start analyzers concurrently #67159
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Save full state in nullable walker when visiting conditional operand #67157
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Visit replacement expression before adding placeholder in RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #67155
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix issue with 'convert typeof(x) to nameof(x)' with 'nint' #67151
    Area-IDE
  • Force solution-asset system to fail if it can't find an asset for a checksum #67149
    Area-IDE
  • Show preview window for sync namespace #67147
    Area-IDE
  • Support 'go to base' on a constructor symbol #67146
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Fix workspace pull diagnostics #66886
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #67152
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix property initialization issue in KeyValueLogMessage #66531
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update feature status of "Primary Constructors" #67137
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix some null annotations on IDynamicFileInfoProvider #67141
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use implicit/explicit extension as syntax #66919
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix bootstrap build #67156
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to main #67154
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Thread cancellationToken instead of capturing it in delegates #67087
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Update versions to 17.6-preview3 #67148
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Snap 17.6 preview 2 #67145
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Improve completion results when dotting of lambda parameter #67144
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix exception when the list only contains a suggestion mode item #67132
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Do not access Workspace.CurrentSolution when cleaning up a code-action's operations. #67116
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Keep runtime version in sync with VS #67164
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Push on Restore bug #66864
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Compute TextChange based on syntax instead of text #67120
    Area-IDE
  • Fix crash of type snippets after accessibility modifier #67055
    Community
  • Use per-user temporary directories for AnalyzerAssemblyLoader #66983
    Community
  • Prevent LegacyGlobalOptionService from GC rooting PreviewWorkspace #67142
    Area-IDE
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2126581 #67077
  • Revert "Fix extraction inside anonymous function" #67133
    Area-IDE
  • Bind extension declarations #67126
    Area-Compilers
  • Support POSIX environment for build boss #67066
    Community
  • Move all Document Outline update operations to background thread #65641
    Area-IDE
  • Async lightbulb performance improvement #66970
    Area-IDE
  • List patterns: Add initial support for enumerables #66553
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Switch integration CI to Preview Scout queue #67143
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Bump Microsoft.ServiceHub.Framework to 4.2.70-beta #67071
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Don't show expanded items when filter text is very short #67049

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: Max working set on ARM #47007
  • Consume wasm targets and metadata from the .NET Wasm SDK #47001
  • Move integrity support to the Static Web Assets SDK from the Blazor Webassembly SDK #47000
  • Move service worker support to the Static Web Assets SDK from the Blazor Webassembly SDK #46999
  • Move asset compression to the Static Web Assets SDK from the Blazor Webassembly SDK #46998
  • Split static web assets SDK from the Razor SDK #46997
  • [Blazor united] Improved model for preserving persistent component state #46995
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Set component render mode either at the call site or in the component itself #46994
  • Ability to opt into streaming SSR on a per-subtree basis #46993
  • Blazor United: startup APIs for enabling Server/WebAssembly hosting #46992
  • When rendering interactive components, ability to pass in passive RenderFragment as parameter #46991
  • [Blazor] Action result for rendering a component #46990
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Add custom format support to HttpLogging middleware #46989
  • Blazor United: SSR endpoint implementation #46988
  • Blazor United: Antiforgery #46987
  • Blazor United: APIs for handling incoming form posts #46986
  • Blazor United: SSR endpoint definition #46985
  • Blazor United: SSR endpoint metadata and integration with ASP.NET #46984
  • Blazor United: Validation on form posts #46983
  • Blazor United: SSR endpoint registration #46982
  • Blazor United: Model Binding on form posts #46981
  • Blazor United: Proper discovery of SSR pages/endpoints #46980
  • Allow elapsed time in HttpLogging #46979
  • Basic discovery of endpoints #46978
  • SignalR - Reconnect after closed connection results in a HttpRequestException #46977
  • Edge Enhanced Security mode is not easily detectable in Blazor #46976
  • built-in Rate Limiting middleware in .Net 7 #46974
  • Blazor JS script section #46973
  • Identity database scaffolding #46970
  • Reduce the size of the Developer Exception Page in NativeAOT #46969

Closed

  • (string[])Request.Headers["NonExistentHeader"] is null while (IEnumerable<string>)Request.Headers["NonExistentHeader"] is not #44509
    8.0-preview3
  • Run on Mac OS 13.0 in Helix #45749
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor Server Fails to Load blazor.server.js #46947
  • [RDG] Support reading from `EmptyBodyBehavior` when processing `[FromBody]` attribute #46639
    8.0-preview2
  • Client result method accepting arguments that is unhandled by the client results in hanging until timeout #46825
    8.0-preview3
  • Dynamically change user roles/authentication state in blazor server for logged in user upon user action #46881
  • We can perform basic CRUD operations on a completely SSR Razor Components app #46351
    8.0-preview3
  • ASP.NET Identity token provider clarifications #46892
  • [API Proposal] Productize QuickGrid #46789
    8.0-preview2
  • Productize QuickGrid #46317
    8.0-preview2
  • The `asp-for` tag helper should render an `aria-describedby` attribute #46829
  • DeveloperExceptionPage showing and disappearing fast #46859
  • Asp Net Identity Templates might make probing for existing users too easy #46652
  • NullReferenceException in DefaultOutputFormatterSelector.ValidateContentTypes #46628
  • [Blazor] Improve the class `DataTransferItem` #46739
  • net::ERR_CONTENT_LENGTH_MISMATCH 200 (OK) #46784

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove some Linq usages from Kestrel.Core #47012
    area-runtime
  • Consolidate RDF and RDG tests (part 1) #47011
    area-runtime
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `0b40b4f` to `c8375a9` #47009
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `3d787f5` to `2d4f208` #47008
    area-infrastructure
  • Use EndpointFilterInvocationContext.Create in RDG source #47005
    area-runtime
  • Remove some Linq usages from Routing #47004
    area-runtime
  • [release/7.0] Fail client result if client can't parse invocation argument(s) #47003
    area-signalr, 7.0.x
  • Blazor united initial startup apis for registering pages #46996
    area-blazor
  • Backport QuickGrid to preview 2 #46975
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Consistently return StringValues.Empty instead of default for missing headers #46226
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview3
  • Enable linux-musl composite artifact and rename to match the Blob convention #47002
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview3
  • Fix warnings about dependabot.yml errors #47006
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview3
  • Try OSX 13 again #45855
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview3
  • Fail client result if client can't parse invocation argument(s) #46910
    area-signalr, 8.0-preview3
  • Productize QuickGrid #46573
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview3

Updated

  • Expose the original status code in StatusCodeReExecuteFeature #46539
    area-runtime
  • Expose the SslStream and Cipher Suite on ITlsHandshakeFeature #46824
    area-runtime
  • Update TryParse code gen to use CodeWriter. #46928
    area-runtime
  • Implement request timeout middleware #46115
    area-runtime, community-contribution, blog-candidate
  • Add short circuit in routing #46713
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2126480 #46963
    area-mvc
  • Sections support #46727
    area-blazor
  • [RDG] Support serializing polymorphic response types with STJ #46791

  • Add support for F# `Async<'T>` as an awaitable type in minimal APIs #46898

  • SSR as library #46935

  • Correct a few nullable annotations #46911

  • Fallback using the `CultureInfo.Parent` instead of using hyphen #46637

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

Closed

  • Cosmos test failure due to line format mismatch #27222
    8.0.0
  • System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object. #30295
  • Optionally map property if column exists, otherwise silently ignore #30322
  • EF6 : DTO with collection property generates LEFT JOIN instead INNER JOIN #30336
  • The specified deps.json file doesn't exist #22247
  • Json: updating property with conversion from string to other type fails on sql server #30330
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Create directory chain if doesn't exist for ef migrations bundle #30392

Merged

  • [SMALL] Fix to #30330 - Json: updating property with conversion from string to other type fails on sql server #30380
    auto-merge
  • Make test provider-agnostic #30388
  • Fix for Cosmos embedded line ending #30379
  • Some fixes to SqlQueryTestBase #30384

Updated

  • Port simple relationship scenarios from docs samples #30365
  • Handle entity paths with no tables in model differ #30347
